title: Tata Motors eyes 4-6% increase in PV market share by 2030
description: The introduction of new nameplates is expected to boost volumes and operating leverage and revenues across PV and EV, bumping up realisations at the portfolio level. It also sees  softening of battery prices to drive higher profitability for EVs.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
